A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible film that is so wracked with partisan political messaging\, the plot and story are fundamentally undermined and immersive engagement is destroyed. Unsubtle propaganda via unnecassary characters\, Military incompetence\, tone innapropriate gags\, destroying the groundedness of Force ability via things like Leia Poppins. The one positive element that comes to mind is that unlike Prequel Trilogy and Hobbit films for example\, they are finding the right balance between Practical Effects and CGI and some of the Cinematography is amazing.
